documentation.title: GridPager Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php grid, php ajax grid, php datagrid, php gridview, ajax grid php

property.name: PageIndex
property.shortdesc: Get or set the page index.
property.longdesc: Get or set the page index.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->PageIndex = 3; ?>

property.name: PageSize
property.shortdesc: Get or set the page size.
property.longdesc: Get or set the page size.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->PageSize = 20; ?>

property.name: ShowPageInfo
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether page information is shown.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether page information is shown.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->ShowPageInfo = false; ?>

property.name: PageInfoTemplate
property.shortdesc: Get or set the folder which images is stored.
property.longdesc: Get or set the folder which images is stored.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->PageInfoTemplate = "Displaying page {PageIndex}"; ?>

property.name: Position
property.shortdesc: Get or set the position of pager.
property.longdesc: Get or set the position of pager.

value.desc: Grid show pager at both top and bottom position

property.name: ShowPageSize
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether pagesize selection box is shown.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether pagesize selection box is shown and allow user to change the page size.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->ShowPageSize = false; ?>

property.name: PageSizeText
property.shortdesc: Get or set the text in front of pagesize select box.
property.longdesc: Get or set the text in front of pagesize select box.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->PageSizeText = "Change Page Size:"; ?>

property.name: PageSizeOptions
property.shortdesc: Get or set the pagesize options.
property.longdesc: Get or set the pagesize options. The options separate from each other by commas.
property.samplecode: <?php $grid->MasterTable->Pager = new GridPrevNextPager();// GridPrevNextPager is inherited from GridPager. $grid->MasterTable->Pager->PageSizeOptions = "1,5,7,15,30"; ?>
